title: Are We 'Food-Policing' The Poor?
teaser: There has been much debate across the country, and in Wisconsin, about the expectations we put on those receiving public benefits. Kathleen's guest wants to personalize the debate. Sheâ€™s a freelance writer who has recently written about her childhood and growing up with food insecurity. She believes that the practice of food-policing and food-shaming of poor people needs to stop.
